name: agricultural-iot-platform
description: Agricultural IoT monitoring platform with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: start "Backend" cmd /c "npm run dev --prefix backend" && start "Frontend" cmd /c "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.clean:
if exist frontend
ode_modules rmdir /s /q frontend
ode_modules && if exist backend
ode_modules rmdir /s /q backend
ode_modules && if exist frontend\dist rmdir /s /q frontend\dist
scripts.analyze: npm run build --prefix frontend && echo Frontend built. Check frontend/dist for analysis.
scripts.docs: echo Documentation available in docs/ directory

author: Your Name
